long_description: This Seirus headband goes beyond the conventional with Neofleece(R) insulation for excellent ear protection. Neofleece inserts are a four-layer lamination of a waterproof, breathable liner, neoprene, Thermolite(TM) insulation and a polyester fleece lining. Headband is soft against your skin, warm and lightweight. Seirus Neofleece headband is Ideal for high-exertion winter sports in clear weather when a hat would be too warm.
short_description: This Seirus headband goes beyond the conventional with Neofleece(R) insulation for excellent ear protection.
